titleStmt.title: Bellua marina, or, The monstrous beast which arose out of the sea being a historical description of the papal empire as it is originally copied out of the prophecies of Holy Writ : together with an epitome of the lives of all the popes who have reigned in the church empire for these last 900 years, from the time this beast began to put forth his ten horns at Roma / by J.B.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Butler)

titleStmt.title: Bellua marina, or, The monstrous beast which arose out of the sea being a historical description of the papal empire as it is originally copied out of the prophecies of Holy Writ : together with an epitome of the lives of all the popes who have reigned in the church empire for these last 900 years, from the time this beast began to put forth his ten horns at Roma / by J.B.
